# this will open the URL the caret is on, by searching backwards for an http, ftp, or mailto URL scheme
for (( i = $TM_LINE_INDEX; i >= 0; i-- )); do res=$(perl -pe <<<${TM_CURRENT_LINE:$i} 's/^(((https?|ftp|mailto):\S+?)(?=[),.]*(\s|$)|$)|).*/$1/') if [[ -n $res ]]; then open "$res" break fi done
